name: Jungle Jurassic Shooting
description:
Be careful, because in this dinosaur safari adventure with a mix of action and danger not only you're hunting in the forest, but also you're being hunted

Features:
- Amazingly perfect controls and shooting effects
- Challenge yourself
- Awesome game play with attacking animations and deadly sounds
- Jungle dinosaur sniper hunting game
- Amazingly perfect controls and shooting effects
- Survival and rescue stages
